about_the_game: "Cyan's Snow House" is a heartwarming short indie game that transcends language to provide a universally enjoyable experience. Without a single line of dialogue and requiring only simple mouse clicks to play, players step into the shoes of Cyan, a lone girl in a snow-covered village, who daily feeds and spends time with animals shivering from the cold. Despite its brief playtime of around 10 minutes, it leaves a lasting, wonderful impression on anyone, anywhere in the world. The gentle moments shared between Cyan and the animals convey a warm message: "Your place is here." Recommended for anyone seeking a moment of solace on a cold winter's day, this game promises to melt your heart with its soothing embrace.
